login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Please fill in the Login form below to access your account.
login.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your email and password and try again.

register.title: Registration
register.subtitle: Please fill in the Registration form below to become a member of aklaa.
register.firstNameRequired: First name must be between 1 and 100 characters
register.lastNameRequired: Last name must be between 1 and 100 characters
register.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
register.passwordInvalid: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character (@#$%^&+=!)
register.termsRequired: You must accept the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
register.registerSuccess: Registration successful! An activation email has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to activate your account.
register.registerFailed: Registration failed. This email address may already be in use or there was a problem with the registration. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.resetSuccess: If an account with that email exists, a password reset link has been sent.
forgotPassword.resetFailed: Password reset failed. Please check your email and try again.

forgotPasswordConfirm.title: Reset password
forgotPasswordConfirm.subtitle: Enter a new password and confirm it.
forgotPasswordConfirm.passwordInvalid: Password must be at least 8 characters, include upper and lower case letters, a number and a special character, and contain no spaces.

accountActivation.noToken: No activation token provided. Please check your email for the activation link.
accountActivation.success: Your account has been successfully activated! You can now log in.
accountActivation.failed: Activation failed. The token may be invalid or expired. Please try registering again or contact support.

emailActivation.noToken: No email token provided. Please check your email for the activation link.
emailActivation.success: Your new email has been successfully activated!
emailActivation.failed: Activation failed. The token may be invalid or expired. Please try again or contact support.
